snippet.title: 蒼き雷霆 ガンヴォルト / Azure Striker Gunvolt: The 1st trailer
snippet.description:
蒼き雷霆（アームドブルー） ガンヴォルトの発表用ＰＶです。
The first trailer of "Azure Striker Gunvolt" .
http://gunvolt.com

Inti Creates teams up with Keiji Inafune once again to bring you their first independently published game: Azure Striker Gunvolt. Keiji Inafune is a star creator in the gaming industry that is best known as the creator of Mega Man and also for his work on the Onimusha, Lost Planet, Dead Rising, and Resident Evil series. Inti Creates is made up of game industry veterans with many years of experience in creating critically acclaimed side scrolling action games. 

Featuring exciting, fast paced 2D action, Gunvolt is the story of a boy who uses his septimal power of electricity to thwart the evil ambitions of a massive organization! 

http://gunvolt.com/en

【製品情報】
　タイトル名：蒼き雷霆（ルビ：アームドブルー）ガンヴォルト
　ハードウェア：ニンテンドー3DS（ニンテンドーeショップ）
　ジャンル：ライトノベル２Ｄアクション
　レーティング：Ｂ
　配信日：２０１４年８月２０日（水）
　プレイ人数：1人
　価格：１，９６０円

Title: Azure Striker GUNVOLT
　Platform: Nintendo 3DS & Nintendo 2DS (Nintendo eShop)
　Genre: 2D side-scrolling action game
　Rating: EVERYONE 10+  (Fantasy Violence, Mild Language)
　Release date: August 29, 2014
　Players： 1 player
　Price: $14.99

(C) INTI CREATES CO., LTD. 2014 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
